response.overview: Nasir Jones. The gifted child who paved his way to becoming a rap legend. His unwavering work ethic has allowed him to sell over 13 million albums worldwide. He as received numerous nominations and awards from the music industry and is considered one of the top 5 MCs of all time. He has been through beefs, tragedy, betrayal, adversity, and major scrutiny. This is the untold story of how a shy kid from Queens Bridge Projects became the greatest rapper alive.
response.tagline: The Trials and Triumphs of a Legend
response.title: Nas: The Legend
